extendedIngredients.name: peppers
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 (230 grams)Gypsy Peppers or Sweet Italian Pepper

extendedIngredients.name: tomatoes
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 medium (237 grams) tomatoes, seeded, diced small

recipes.title: Grilled Gypsy Peppers Stuffed with Tomatoes
recipes.instructions: Grill, spray grill grates with cooking spray,In a small bowl add tomatoes, basil and olive oil. Mix until combined and set aside.Cut a slit down the middle of the pepper, than a slit across the top of the pepper (the cut makes a T-shape) but don't cut all the way through the pepper. Carefully take out as much of the seeds as you can.Equally stuff the pepper with tomato mixture and top each pepper with 1/2 tsp of cheese.Place on the grill for about 3 minutes until cheese starts to melt and peppers soften a bit, but be careful not to char it to much.

steps.step: Grill, spray grill grates with cooking spray,In a small bowl add tomatoes, basil and olive oil.
Mix until combined and set aside.

Cut a slit down the middle of the pepper, than a slit across the top of the pepper (the cut makes a T-shape) but don't cut all the way through the pepper. Carefully take out as much of the seeds as you can.Equally stuff the pepper with tomato mixture and top each pepper with 1/2 tsp of cheese.
Place on the grill for about 3 minutes until cheese starts to melt and peppers soften a bit, but be careful not to char it to much.
